/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
